Tag.description: A key-value pair to associated with the Kinesis Video Stream.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. Specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. The following characters can be used: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. Specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. The following characters can be used: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Kinesis Video stream.

Name.description: The name of the Kinesis Video stream.

DataRetentionInHours.description: The number of hours till which Kinesis Video will retain the data in the stream

DeviceName.description: The name of the device that is writing to the stream.

KmsKeyId.description: AWS KMS key ID that Kinesis Video Streams uses to encrypt stream data.

MediaType.description: The media type of the stream. Consumers of the stream can use this information when processing the stream.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs associated with the Kinesis Video Stream.
